entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
